channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Todoist’s app now lets you add tasks to your to-do list by speaking to its AI
item.description: The feature, now public, lets you create to-do's and action items by speaking naturally to the app's AI.

item.title: Apple plans to make Siri an AI chatbot, report says
item.description: Siri could look more like ChatGPT than its current state as an integrated feature across Apple products.

item.title: Trump Claims ‘Concept of a Deal’ Reached for Greenland, Says He’ll Cancel New Tariffs
item.description: The president says he "assumes" Denmark knows about the deal.

item.title: Anthropic revises Claude’s ‘Constitution,’ and hints at chatbot consciousness
item.description: The newly revised document offers a roadmap for what Anthropic says is a safer and more helpful chatbot experience.

item.title: Is ‘Masters of the Universe’ Really Going to Do That?
item.description: Nicholas Galitzine stars as He-Man in the upcoming movie, directed by Travis Knight.

item.title: This hi-res music streaming app is rocketing up the charts – and Spotify’s AI ‘Slopify’ outrage could be supplying the fuel
item.description: AI slop is the scourge of music streaming sites, but French platform Qobuz does things differently –and it's being rewarded with huge growth.

item.title: Windows 11's Xbox app arrives on Arm PCs — just in time for Nvidia's rumored debut with its N1X CPU
item.description: Xbox app debuts on Arm PCs as Microsoft boasts that over 85% of Game Pass titles now work with Arm CPUs.

item.title: JLab JBuds Open Headphones Review: How Open Is Too Open?
item.description: (Creed voice) Head-phone wide op-ahn.

item.title: Washington Is Divided on AI Chip Exports as Anthropic CEO Deems China Sales a ‘Mistake’
item.description: Congress might seek more authority over AI chips exports. MAGA can't make up its mind.

item.title: Apple is reportedly working on an AirTag-sized AI wearable
item.description: Apple is working on an AI-powered wearable pin with cameras and microphones designed to pick up a user's surroundings, according to a report from The Information. The rumored device is reportedly the size of an AirTag, with "thin, flat, circular" housing made from aluminium and glass. The Information reports that Apple's rumored AI pin will […]

item.title: Enfin un vrai chatbot pour Siri ? Apple le lancerait cet automne
item.description: Des années après ses principaux rivaux, Apple lancerait finalement son propre chatbot. Il remplacerait l'interface textuelle actuelle de Siri et permettrait de discuter de tout et de rien, sans oublier de nombreuses autres fonctions inédites pour l'assistant.

item.title: Apple's smarter, long-promised AI-powered Siri might be arriving in a few months, according to a new report
item.description: According to a new report from Bloomberg, Apple might ship the AI-powered Siri, first teased in June 2024, which is way more personal, in a few months with iOS 26.4 and Gemini under Apple's Foundational Models.

item.title: 'Floppy disks are the best storage media ever invented' - dad modder creates an ingenious TV control system that lets toddler select shows with the iconic storage device
item.description: Floppy disks have become a physical TV selector, letting toddlers choose shows simply while avoiding menus, ads, and complex television interfaces.

item.title: Marshall's new Heddon hub adds multi-room audio to speakers with Auracast
item.description: Marshall plans to add seamless multi-room audio to its Bluetooth speakers via a newly announced music streaming hub called Heddon. The $300 hub makes it possible to connect and synchronize multiple older Marshall speakers together, not unlike Sonos' audio devices.Rather than use Wi-Fi to get multiple speakers playing the same audio, though, the Marshall Heddon uses Auracast. The hub connects to services like Spotify Connect or Tidal over Wi-Fi, or other devices through Google Cast and AirPlay, and then shares that audio over Auracast to the Marshall Acton III, Stanmore III and Wobrun III speak...

item.title: ‘It: Welcome to Derry’ Season 2 Is All But Confirmed
item.description: Fans have been waiting for official word on whether HBO's Stephen King adaptation from co-creators Andy Muschietti, Barbara Muschietti, and Jason Fuchs will return.

item.title: Apple is reportedly overhauling Siri to be an AI chatbot
item.description: Apple has been spinning its wheels for many months over its approach to artificial intelligence, but a strategy finally appears to be emerging for the company. Bloomberg's Mark Gurman reported today that Apple's long-awaited Siri overhaul will allegedly involve transforming the voice assistant into an AI chatbot, internally called Campos. Sources have reportedly told Gurman that Apple chatbot will completely replace the current Siri interface in favor of a more interactive model similar to those used by OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google's Gemini. He also cited sources who claimed that while Apple ha...

item.title: ‘Pirates of the Caribbean’ Director Has a Theory on Why Visual FX Suck So Much Now
item.description: Gore Verbinski says the software behind modern blockbusters may be the real problem.

item.title: You’d Be Surprised How Few Companies Are Behind Half the World’s CO2 Emissions
item.description: Fortunately, emissions data is increasingly being used to hold these companies accountable.

item.title: A massive Microsoft Surface sale is underway at Amazon and Best Buy — score 'the best Surface ever' for its lowest-ever price
item.description: Several Microsoft Surface devices are on sale at record-low prices, and even with new models rumoured to be announced soon, these are well worth buying if you want a great value laptop.

item.title: Apple is reportedly developing a wearable AI pin
item.description: Apple will reportedly try to succeed where Humane failed (miserably). On Wednesday, The Information reported that the iPhone maker is working on an AI pin. The wearable is said to resemble a slightly thicker AirTag and include multiple cameras, a speaker, microphones, and wireless charging.The report coincides with another from Bloomberg that claims that Apple will revamp Siri as a ChatGPT-style chatbot. When combined with the recent announcement that Google's Gemini will power Siri AI, it looks like the company is finally making a more defined play for a piece of the generative AI pie. On the...

item.title: Amazon’s newest AI doesn’t just chat — it knows your health history
item.description: The next time you’ve got an itchy throat and a stuffy nose, Amazon wants you to describe your symptoms to an AI chatbot deputized to do medicine. On Wednesday, Amazon announced the launch of the new feature, inviting users who subscribe to its healthcare service to interact with an AI assistant for personalized medical advice. […] The next time you’ve got an itchy throat and a stuffy nose, Amazon wants you to describe your symptoms to an AI chatbot deputized to do medicine....

item.title: Report: Apple does about-face on Siri chatbot — and it might compete directly with ChatGPT and Google
item.description: Is Apple building an entirely new Siri Chatbot? One rumor says that's the new plan, even if it's the opposite of what Apple execs once told us.

item.title: Apple pourrait lancer un badge connecté de la taille d’un AirTag
item.description: Et si Humane avait eu raison avant tout le monde ? Le badge connecté de la défunte start-up, l'Ai Pin, a été un échec retentissant. Mais l'idée en elle-même pourrait être reprise par d'autres… et pourquoi pas Apple ?

item.title: A new LinkedIn phishing scam is targeting executives online - make sure you don't fall for this
item.description: A little bit of Python, a little bit of DLL sideloading, and a little bit of fake jobs.

item.title: Apps for boycotting American products surge to the top of the Danish App Store
item.description: The boost in downloads comes as Danish consumers have been organizing a grassroots boycott of American-made products, which also included canceling their U.S. vacations and ditching their subscriptions to U.S.-based streaming services, like Netflix.

item.title: Anthropic’s new Claude ‘constitution’: be helpful and honest, and don’t destroy humanity
item.description: Anthropic is overhauling Claude's so-called "soul doc." The new missive is a 57-page document titled "Claude's Constitution," which details "Anthropic's intentions for the model's values and behavior," aimed not at outside readers but the model itself. The document is designed to spell out Claude's "ethical character" and "core identity," including how it should balance conflicting […]...

item.title: 2026 Grammy Awards: Who’s performing, how to watch, and more
item.description: The main show will air live on CBS beginning at 8 p.m. Eastern on Feb. 1 as well as several streaming platforms. The 68th annual Grammy Awards will take place Feb. 1 at the Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles. This year marks a return to normalcy after the 2025 award show was altered to focus on supporting relief efforts following the devastating Los Angeles-area wildfires....

item.title: Irony alert: Hallucinated citations found in papers from NeurIPS, the prestigious AI conference
item.description: Research from startup GPTZero points to the impossible problem prestigious conferences face in the age of AI slop.

item.title: What Type of Mattress Is Right for You? (2026)
item.description: Here’s how to pick the best mattress for your sleep needs, straight from a professional mattress tester.
